{{Wireless embedded system |brand=LG-Ericsson |model=WBR-3020 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin=B007W7URF2 |price= |est_release_date=07/2011 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |manuf=Senao |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand= |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand= |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=LG-EricssonXXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^LG-Ericsson[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=B4:0E:DC |oui_eth=B4:0E:DC }} [http://www.lgericssonus.com/jsp/lgnortel/global/global.product.readProduct.laf?mid=2&openId=3&sid=0&level=2&ca_id1=79&item_id=54&item_dtl_id=54 Product page]
[http://www.lgericssonus.com/jsp/lgnortel/global/global.product.readProduct.laf?mid=2&openId=3&sid=0&level=2&ca_id1=79&item_id=54&item_dtl_id=54# Manual] (dated June 2011)
[http://www.lgericssonus.com/jsp/lgnortel/global/global.product.readProduct.laf?mid=2&openId=3&sid=0&level=2&ca_id1=79&item_id=54&item_dtl_id=54# Datasheet] Default settings are per '''LG-Ericsson''''s manual. :The default SSID pattern is presumed to be '''LG-EricssonXXXXXX'''. There are 13 entries for this SSID in WiGLE as of 04/05/2013. :The OUI used is presumed to be B4:0E:DC (shown in the manual, also the only OUI used for the LG-EricssonXXXXXX SSID in WiGLE). [http://s000.tinyupload.com/index.php?file_id=61031925388613530146 Firmware update 1.1.3 fixes stability issues] ==Images== File:LG-Ericsson_WBR-3020_main.jpg|main [[Has images::external| ]]
